text:
[Verse]
Raindrops fall on my face
Twirl around in this place
With a smile I can't erase
Feel the rhythm set the pace

[Verse 2]
Clouds above soaked in gray
But my heart's a sunny day
Splashing puddles where I play
Let the music lead the way

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Glowing in the city lights
Every step just feels so right
In the rain
Hold me tight

[Bridge]
Wet streets shine like mirrors
Raindrops whisper
No more fears
Hand in hand
Our path is clear
In the rain
We're always near

[Verse 3]
Laughs and glances
Spinning round
Feet off the ground
We haven't found
A better stage
A sweeter sound
In each other's arms
We're bound

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Glowing in the city lights
Every step just feels so right
In the rain
Hold me tight
title: Dancing in the Rain
